channel.title: Installation on rbxmk
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on rbxmk

item.title: Compiling from source
item.description: This document contains information for compiling and installing rbxmk. rbxmk is written in Go. For development, it is recommend to be familiar with the go command. Basic installation # Instead of using prebuilt releases, rbxmk can be installed manually. Install Go Install Git Using a shell with Git (such as Git Bash), run the following command: go install github.com/anaminus/rbxmk/rbxmk@latest If you installed Go correctly, this will install the latest version of rbxmk to $GOPATH/bin, which will allow you run it directly from a shell.
